item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, we will be having a game night, please bring any fun game you would like to play. I have on hand "Apples to Apples" "Marry Date or Dump" and some other interesting games.

The house is really nice, and it's a great place to meet new people and talk!

We will be having a potluck so bring something interesting to share!

We will be dancing to some fun music there also.

If anyone has any questions or get's lost you can call me at 603-312-6735. I will have some tiki torches at the end of the driveway so just look for them if you get lost.

My parents house is on the intersection of Lundy Lane and Hampshire Ave, it is a long paved driveway. Do not go down the dirt road which is called "Long Pond Road" which is right next to the paved driveway.

Please park on the side of Hampshire Ave.

See you there.

A small donation would be appreciated.

Peter
item.why: We all love to meet new people and play games1

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Game Night Party
